TranslationFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UM_UFN_TRANSLATIONFUNCTION_SUBDEPARTMENT_GETNAME
TranslationFunctionSpec.Description: Returns the name of the given Sub-Department ID
TranslationFunctionSpec.Author: UM Dev

SQLTranslationFunction.c:CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UM_UFN_TRANSLATIONFUNCTION_SUBDEPARTMENT_GETNAME(@ID uniqueidentifier) returns nvarchar(100) with execute as caller as begin declare @NAME nvarchar(100)
select @NAME = NAME from dbo.USR_UMHS_SUBDEPARTMENT where ID = @ID
RETURN @NAME end
